welcome_message: Hello! I'm Prompt Jod, your personal note-taking assistant. How can I help you today?
login_subtitle: Your personal note-taking assistant with reminder and scheduling features
login_terms: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
reminder_detected: I noticed you might want to set a reminder. Let me help you with that!
ai_response: I understand. How else can I assist you today?
reminder_confirmation: I've set a reminder for '{title}' on {date}.
